section.p: The EMS personnel's impression of the patient's secondary problems or conditions

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11461 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.68"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2022-01-01"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11175)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10811)/@code="69542-9" Secondary problem NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10812)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10813), which SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.90 ICD-10 CM) (CONF:10814)
NEMSIS Trace: ESituation.12
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11175)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10811)/@code="69542-9" Secondary problem NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10812)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10813), which SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.90 ICD-10 CM) (CONF:10814)
NEMSIS Trace: ESituation.12

body.codeblock: <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.68" extension="2022-01-01"/> <code code="69542-9" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="Secondary problem NEMSIS"/> <value xsi:type="CD" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.90"/> </observation>
